What is the default timeout during HTTP requests set to 60?
The default timeout during HTTP requests is not set to 60. According to the documentation, the default timeout is actually set to 30. This can be modified using the `-rpcservertimeout=<n>` option.

`-rpcservertimeout=<n>`
    Timeout during HTTP requests (default: 30)
